Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ViewReconnectedListener, PlayerListener, ViewListener, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.EventListener
    public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, PlayerListener, ViewReconnectedListener, ViewListener
    This class has the purpose of managing the game flow

                                                Interviewer view)

        player - active player
        view - the view to be asked
        Returns:
        the selected powerup to be discarded

                                    Interviewer view)
        This method manages the weaponTile selection for a WEAPON_CHOICE_QUESTION
        Parameters:
        question - string to be sent as question to the client
        weaponTiles - selectable weapon tiles
        view - view that will manage the selection
        Returns:
        the selected weapon tile

      • reloadWeapon

        private void reloadWeapon​(WeaponTile weapon,
                          Player activePlayer,
                          Interviewer view)
        This function reloads the given weapon, managing the reload cost
        Parameters:
        weapon - weapon that needs to be reloaded
        activePlayer - is the player who has to reload a weapon
        view - is the interface that decides what coin to use to reload the weapon

      • manageActions

        private void manageActions​(Player player,
                           View view)
        This function manage the player's actions during player's turn
        Parameters:
        player - is the player who is currently player
        view - is the interface who decides how to manage the player

      • candidateBasicActions

        private java.util.Set<BasicAction> candidateBasicActions​(java.util.List<BasicAction> playedActions,
                                                         java.util.List<CompoundAction> compoundActions)
        This private method calculate the possible BasicActions the player can do
        Parameters:
        playedActions - is the list of actions done in this turn by the players
        compoundActions - is the list of possible compound actions the player can do in that particular macro action. They can variate from gaming mode to gaming mode or by the state of the player
        Returns:
        a Set of possible basic actions the player can execute

      • canPerformAction

        private boolean canPerformAction​(Player player,
                                 BasicAction action)
        Returns true if the player can do the given action
        Parameters:
        player - the player who wants to execute the action
        action - the action that needs to be executed
        Returns:
        true if the player can execute the action

      • selectTarget

        private Player selectTarget​(Powerup powerup,
                            Player self,
                            Interviewer view)
        This method selects the target for SELF or OTHERS target types
        Parameters:
        powerup - the Powerup that needs to know his targets
        self - the Player who is activating the powerup
        view - the interface that will select the target if needed
        Returns:
        the optional of the target, if available. Optional.Empty() otherwise

      • discardPowerupTile

        private void discardPowerupTile​(Player player,
                                PowerupTile toBeDiscarded)
        This method manages the discard process of a powerup. Discard the powerup from the player's hand and puts it in the discarded powerup pack
        Parameters:
        player - player who needs to discard the powerup
        toBeDiscarded - powerup to be discarded
